snippet.title: New Game-CMGE Fantastic Games-Candleman
snippet.description:
Despite the fact that it can only burn for 10 seconds, a little candle decides to walk into the darkness, on a journey to seek the light. ( - Game Spot)  
One of the Best Indie Games now comes to mobile! Imagine you are the little candle, what you can do to keep the flame alive?

【Brief Introductions】

In a world of endless darkness, as a little candle that can only burn for 10 seconds, what would you choose? To burn out yourself and wait for death, or to light up the darkness and hunt for hopes?
